page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: Modern houses have a variety of rooms which are used for different purposes, and contain diverse furnishings. {The Lounge}_typically furnished with woollen rugs or carpets, upholstered chairs and settees. Heating either from radiators or fires ( coal,gas oil or electric).Other furniture could include television,small tables, bookcases, record player, lamps, cushions,pictures and posters on the walls.Curtains at all windows. A fire place is often found as the focal point of this room. The room is used mainly for relaxation and recreation with the family :_ watching television, listening to music, or perhaps playing board games.The lounge is used mostly in the evenings, or at weekends.
